about_the_game:
Trance, house, breakbeat - three dozen explosive soundtracks, from Betelgeuze - a man who has many names, more than once in the top 100 on Beatport, the founder of the label Flying Music Reloaded, the tracks of which have decorated more than one game..
Tracklist:
Alin - Terminus
Betelgeuze - Free Fall
Betelgeuze - 138 BPM
Betelgeuze - A.I.
Betelgeuze - Ambient
Betelgeuze - Amphibian

Betelgeuze - Chrome (Power Mix)
Betelgeuze - Cigarette
Betelgeuze - Cosmic Love
Betelgeuze - Dark Psychic Storm
Betelgeuze - Dark Side
Betelgeuze - Demonic Side
Betelgeuze - E Party Night
Betelgeuze - Ecstasy In My Mind
Betelgeuze - Enigmatic
Betelgeuze - Essence
Betelgeuze - Ghost Musician
Betelgeuze - In The Sky
Betelgeuze - Project 200
Betelgeuze - Restart Your Mind
Betelgeuze - Swamp
Betelgeuze - Target
Betelgeuze - The Epic Battle
Betelgeuze - The Last Mile
Betelgeuze - Trailer
Betelgeuze - Waiting for Sunrise
Betelgeuze - We Are Mad
Betelgeuze - We Can Do

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Sound Card: The sound device compatible with DirectX® 9
